parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp for request verification and request expiry. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: This token for API access verification. API access returns 0 if token expires within 3 hours

parameters.name: sign
parameters.description: Signature generated from a sorted concatenation of all request parameters

response_fields.name: error
response_fields.description: Error description if there was an error. Empty if no error occurred

response_fields.name: message
response_fields.description: Error description if there was an error. Empty if no error occurred

response_fields.name: request_id
response_fields.description: An identifier for API request for error tracking
